eng_name: Rain Man Or Sunny Man Meter
jp_name: 雨男晴れ男メーター "Ameotoko hareotoko mētā"
function: This meter allow you to check that person is a rain man (Ameotoko), or a sunny man (Hareotoko). Not only for a man, this gadget work to a woman like Shizuka-chan.
appears_in: It's Tough To Be a Rain Man

jp_name: 階(かい)級(きゅう)ワッペン
function: The person with the highest ranked badge must be obeyed by the people who wear lower ranked badges than this person. The badges can only be removed by the person who appointed them.
The gadget makes the person fulfill their promise.

When wearing it while watching, all of the objects and people there will emerge out of the TV like a 3D dimensional image but if anyone touch the image the real vesion of it will go out of the TV and become real.

First you must scan any object you want it. then there will be eggs that come out from this gadget, after that break the egg with using a hamer and Ta-da. You got a replica or miniature of that object.

jp_name: レスキューボトル Resukyū Botoru
function: This is one of the example, If there is a people lost or missing in a snowstorm. You will used this to rescue the one. It needs only the victim smell and it will find and rescue it. This is used also as a medicine.

jp_name: もどしクリーム Modoshi Kurīmu
function: It can remove the Specter Cream effect to back to normal.

jp_name: さかのぼりボート Sakanobori Bōto
function: The boat can move in the opposite direction of the flow of water.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

function: It used to reverse an attack to backfire/bounce back to the attacker by waving it in front of things coming up.
appears_in: The New Record of Nobita: Spaceblazer
Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld

jp_name: ロボ子 Robokoユリ子 Yuriko (1973 anime)General informationCasual informationRelationshipsOther DetailsGallery
function:
Roboko (ロボ子 Robo-ko) or Yuriko (ユリ子 Yuri-ko - 1973 only), also known as Robyn in the English Amazon Kindle translation, is a gadget and character brought by Doraemon from the 22nd century.
Yuriko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, blue eyes and red hair in a yellow bow. She wears a blue dress and boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, black eyes and black hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a pink dress and white boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, black eyes and pink hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a pink dress and white boots.
Roboko is a robot girl with the appearance of a 10-12 years old girl. She has fair skin, brilliant grayish green eyes, green hair with short trims and bangs with a red ribbon. She wears a yellow dress with a pair of red boots.
The red ribbon is a switch that can activate/shut down the whole machine.
As specified by Doraemon, Roboko is supposed to be a friendly robot and also a bodyguard, while the target can be manually specified. However, she often becomes jealous when her target gets drawn away by anything else. She does not display aggression to other robots such as Doraemon.
Roboko is one of the "Secret Base Items" in the game. It can be crafted by collecting からクリナッツ(Chestnut), ?がたコンピューター(? Computer) and ナゾの?かい (? or Mystery).

Rocky Head or Stone Head (石頭 Ishiatama) is one of Doraemon's body parts and sort of a gadget.
Doraemon's head is so heavy that it can destroy everything hard. Despite its indestructibility, Doraemon is still able to feel the pain in his head.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots

jp_name: ペタリハンド Petari hando
function:
Rubber Hand or Suction Hand (ペタリハンド Petari hando) is one of Doraemon's body parts and sort of a gadget.
It can stick onto anything without fingers, allowing to pull things, climb up walls and ceilings.
appears_in: Battle! Cat-Model Robots VS Dog-Model Robots
